channel.title: Need help i have a problem(with npc drops)
channel.description: i have some npc added to my server and i added the drop bones script but when a npc dies it drops nothing can some1 help me please

i mean npc dont drop anything when they die i add some herbs in the npcdrops.cfg

and i add a script that the always drop bones but it also doesnt work
